With a blast of retro eighties videogame chic, Heavy Weapon brings classic shooter action and explosive power. Fight through 19 story-based missions to upgrade six different weapon banks, or jump into instant action...

name: The Sims 3: Pets
description: Bring excitement and surprise into your Sims' lives with pets in The Sims 3: Pets, an expansion pack for The Sims 3! Create the perfect (or imperfect) pets for your Sims, from fierce guard dogs to destructive kittens to trusty horses and more as you determine not only how your Sims' pets look but...

name: Xevious Ressurection
description: A new game in the Xevious series, only released as part of the Namco Museum Essentials compilation.

name: Far Cry 3: Monkey Business
description: The DLC adds 4 additional missions in the story mode, which involves Hurk to be recognized as a Rakyat warrior.

name: Spider-Man 4
description: Spider-Man 4 is an unreleased game for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC that was based on the movie of the same name. It was meant to tie in with the cancelled fourth Spider-Man movie.

name: Transformers: War for Cybertron Map and Character Pack
description: The additional TRANSFORMERS characters entering the pack include SCATTERSHOT, ONSLAUGHT, SHOCKWAVE, DEMOLISHOR and JAZZ. Players have access to all five characters in the game's adrenaline-pumping, four-player co-op Escalation mode, and will be able to select their chassis to create their own...

name: Transformers: War for Cybertron Map and Character Pack 2
description: The new playable TRANSFORMERS characters joining the roster will include ZETA PRIME and DEAD END. Players will have access to both characters in the game's heart-pounding, four-player co-op Escalation mode, and will be able to select their chassis to create their own TRANSFORMERS character in the...

name: Dante's Inferno: St. Lucia Edition
description:
The St. Lucia Edition is a “Game of the Year Edition” release and in addition to the game and manual the St. Lucia Edition includes the following:

exclusive artwork
The dark Forest DLC
Trials of St. Lucia DLC

This Version was only available in Italy.

name: Minecraft: N7 Mash-up
description: Shape the fate of your Minecraft galaxy with this amazing mash-up, which includes thirty-six character skins, bespoke game textures, themed menus, a dedicated world filled with iconic locations, and an original soundtrack compilation to set the mood.

name: Minecraft: Dragonborn Mash-up
description: The Dragonborn meets Minecraft in a clash of epic proportions. Build your own worlds in the land of Tamriel and experience adventure with many of its most iconic characters. Fus Ro Dah!

name: Minecraft: Festive Mash-up
description: Wander through a winter wonderland! World, textures, skins, and more!

name: Minecraft: Greek Mythology Mash-up
description: Build a pantheon fit for the gods, trap the Minotaur in an elaborate maze, or set sail for adventures across the sea. The world is your square oyster!

name: Minecraft: LittleBigPlanet Edition
description:
Mix the crazy, non-stop creativity of LittleBigPlanet into the endless fun and freedom of Minecraft with this special mashup pack.
Sackboy, Sackgirl, OddSock, Toggle, and Swoop will decorate your Minecraft universe with a whole heap of LBP characters, creatures, and stuff.

name: Dirt 3: Monte Carlo Track Pack
description:
Monte Carlo Track Pack is a DLC for Dirt 3 featuring a new track with several routes located in the Alps.

This DLC was later included into Dirt 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Ken Block Special Pack
description: Download the Ken Block Special Pack and receive a customized and upgraded Ford Escort Mk II, an Open Class Rally car sporting a killer Ken Block livery.

name: Dirt 3: Mud and Guts Car Pack
description:
The Mud & Guts Car Pack is a downloadable content pack in Dirt 3. It can be purchased via the Xbox Live Marketplace for 480 MSP, or the PlayStation Store for $5.99. Each of the vehicles are also available separately.

Featured cars

Lancia Stratos
Peugeot 205 T16 Evo 2
Citroën C4 Rallycross
Ford...

name: Minecraft: Halloween Mash-up
description: Dress suitably spookily and prepare for the ultimate Minecraft Halloween thrill ride!

name: Minecraft: Chinese Mythology Mash-up
description: Journey through epic terrain and find enlightenment in this mythical Mash-up!

name: Dirt 3: X-Games Asia Track Pack
description:
X Games Asia Track Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring two racing circuits located in Shibuya,Tokyo. These tracks were previously featured in DiRT 2.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Power and Glory Car Pack
description:
Power and Glory Car Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring 5 new vehicles each with 5 liveries: BMW M3, Lancia Delta S4, Ford Focus ST, Scion tC, and Chevrolet Camaro SSX Concept.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Mini Gymkhana Special Pack
description:
Mini Gymkhana Special Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring a Mini Cooper S customized exclusively for Gymkhana events.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Colin McRae Vision Charity Pack
description:
McRae Vision Charity Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring a single car with a selection of 5 liveries: Ford Escort Mk2. The vehicle is designed for the 70s Rally Class.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Minecraft: Vault-Tec Mash-up
description: Welcome to the wasteland! Crack open the Vault containing 44 unique skins, custom textures, re-skinned mobs, a special post-apocalyptic map, an original soundtrack compilation, and a Pip-Boy-inspired UI.

name: Minecraft: Adventure Time Mash-up
description: Adventure Time, c'mon grab your tools, we're going to a very blocky world. With Jake the Dog and Finn the Human, and a bundle of their friends, it's Adventure Time... Mash-up! Featured in this pack: your favorite Adventure Time characters, the Land of Ooo, a bespoke texture set, BMO-themed UI, and...

name: Minecraft: Norse Mythology Mash-up
description: Are you heroic enough to enter the Great Hall, Valhalla? Find out in the Norse Mythology Mash-up! Compose your own grand saga as you voyage through the 9 realms, from the treetops of Yggdrasil, down into the mines of Svartalfheim and the depths of Hel!

name: Minecraft: Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up
description: Take what you can. Give nothing back! Join Jack and his crew in the Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up, featuring many of your favorite rogues and rascals. Plot a course from Tortuga to Shipwreck Cove and all the way down to Davy Jones’ Locker. This is the day you will always remember as the day you...

name: Minecraft: The Nightmare Before Christmas Mash-up
description:
A nightmare? Before Christmas?
With thousands of blocks over there
And more redstone than I can bear?
Looks scary, but also fun!
Could it be I got my wish?
Should I play, or should I run?
A Christmas pack so nightmarish!

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Multiplayer Havoc Pack
description:
The first multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron, it unlocks 5 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Wheeljack, Zeta Prime, Perceptor, Blast Off and Ultra Magnus.

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack
description:
The second multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron that unlocks 4 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Grimlock, Slug, Snarl and Swoop.

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Massive Fury Pack
description:
The third multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron, it unlocks 6 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Autobot Hound, G1 Retro Optimus Prime, Sharpshot, Hardshell, Kickback and Bruticus

name: Minecraft: Egyptian Mythology Mash-up
description: Will you survive the perils of the Pyramids? Journey through the Valley of the Kings, dodge deadly traps, and explore the ancient tombs below! The fourth pack in the Mythology series, this Egyptian-themed Mash-up comes with textures fit for a Pharaoh, legendary mobs, a pantheon of skins, and an...

name: Colin McRae: Dirt 2 - Access All Areas Pack
description: Make the whole world your off-road playground with the Access All Areas Pack! Unlock all 41 tracks playing host to 100 events. Which include entry into exclusive X-Games events in LA, London and Tokyo. Pick your ride, then go anywhere on the World Tour as you compete against stars like Ken Block,...

name: Colin McRae: Dirt 2 - Trust Fund Pack
description: Grab all-star access with the DiRT2 Trust Fund Pack. Download now and instantly unlock 25 best-in-class World Tour vehicles. Plus 10 exhilarating ‘Easter egg’ secret vehicles, 93 liveries and every available upgrade at pro and all star level then take on the World Tour in style. NOTE: All content...

name: Risen 3: Fog Island
description: A stranded Inquisition raiding party is searching for new territory in a world where madness seems to spread. Help them unveil the deadly secret found on this island.

name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
description: A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game could've taken fans to the cobblestone streets of 19th-century Gotham, but the project never saw the light of day. A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game nearly followed the release of 2008's Batman: Arkham Asylum, but the project was sadly canceled before it could see...

name: FIFA 15
description: Old-gen version of FIFA 15, running on the Impact Engine.

name: FIFA 16
description: Port of FIFA 16 for old-gen consoles (PS3 and Xbox 360).

name: FIFA 17
description: Old-gen port of FIFA 17 (PS3 and Xbox 360). This version runs on the older Ignite Engine.

name: Super Robot Taisen
description: A remake of the first Super Robots Wars game.

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Senkan Yamato, Akatsuki ni Shutsugeki su!
Just Dance 2
description: During development of Just Dance 2, a PlayStation 3 port was being made alongside it however was scrapped. Leftover graphics for this port still exist in the final game.

name: Mortal Kombat X
description: A cancelled port of Mortal Kombat X for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.

name: Chucky: Wanna Play?
description: Chucky: Wanna Play? is a stealth-action video game, based on the Child's Play franchise.

name: NBA Jam: Legends On Fire Edition
description: NBA Jam: Legends On Fire Edition is a historical conversion mod of NBA Jam: On Fire Edition. It features the best players on the best 67 teams from the 1980's to 2020's. There are new player heads and bodies, uniforms, arenas, logos, and more. The Road Trip campaign has been changed to a historical...

name: Monopoly Plus: My Little Pony
description: The Rainbow power invades Monopoly! Add some fun, friendship and joy on your board with My Little Pony. This DLC contains a whole customized board with an animated token. It's time to saddle up for the rainbow power and Monopoly!

name: Madden NFL 15
description: The PS3 and Xbox 360 versions of Madden NFL 15 received backlash for removing certain features; online team play was the most notable omission, forcing users to play only 1v1 games.

name: Madden NFL 16
description: Old gen port of Madden NFL 16.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 2
description: The PlayStation port of Street Fighter Alpha 2 features an arranged soundtrack and Shin Akuma as a selectable character via a secret code.

name: 2K Essentials Collection
genre: Shooter, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure
description: The 2K Essentials Collection features the groundbreaking originals Bioshock and Borderlands as well as the highly acclaimed XCOM: Enemy Unknown. A must have collection for any game library.

name: Madden NFL 17
description: Old gen port of Madden NFL 17.

name: Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors' Dreams
description: This version of Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors' Dreams features an arranged soundtrack, a dedicated two-player Versus Mode and also a Training Mode allowing players to practice their techniques and combos on a non-hostile character.

name: Dragon Money
description: Dragon Money is a board game up to 4 players in which the player can choose 1 of 6 different characters and play the board.

name: Motteke Tamago with Ganbare Kamonohashi
description: Motteke Tamago with Ganbare! Kamonohashi is a top-down Bomberman-style multiplayer arcade action game, and an enhanced port of the PC Engine game Motteke Tamago. This version includes the same arcade mode as the original release, and also adds a single-player story mode with multiple stages and new...

name: MX vs. ATV: Untamed
description: The PS2 and Wii port of "MX vs. ATV: Untamed", developed by Incinerator Studios. Not to be confused with the dedicated PS3 version, this PS2 version was also released digitally for the PlayStation 3 via PSN in North America.

name: G-Force
description:
PS2/Wii Port of "G-Force".

G-Force is a licensed game based on the movie of the same name. The player takes the control of Darwin who is member of a secret government organization consisting of guinea pigs. His mission: defending the evil industrial magnate Saber who manipulates home appliances...

name: Shin Megami Tensei
description:
Shin Megami Tensei is a remaster of the original Super Famicom game with improved graphics and gameplay along with a new difficulty mode.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather...

name: Gekiatsu!! Pachige Tamashii Max Evangelion 7 x Seimei no Kodou
Rock Band Sessions
description: Rock Band Sessions was a cancelled entry in the Rock Band series that was intended to be a sequel to Rock Band 3, however was scrapped during development. The game would've had a focus on the composition of music. Gameplay of the cancelled game was later shown off by IGN on May 12, 2015.

name: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band
description: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band was a cancelled spin off for the Rock Band series based around the band Led Zeppelin. The game never got far in development before being cancelled.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Heists
description: Heists was a major content update exclusive to Grand Theft Auto Online. It featured a new 4-player cooperative experience for GTA Online, giving players the chance to team up to pull off a string of intense multi-part heists, raids and robberies. Online Heists spanned numerous missions featuring...

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack
description:
The Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins and two new large maps from Uncharted: Drake's Fortune: The Facility and The Flooded Ruins.

It also added 12 new...

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Siege Expansion Pack
description:
The Siege Expansion Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins, two new maps ("The Highrise" and "Museum"), and the Siege Co-op Arena Playlist.

It also added 11 new Trophies.

name: Uncharted 3: Multiplayer
description: Join the Adventure in Uncharted 3: Multiplayer. Download and play Competitive Multiplayer up to level 15 for Free! Access to Cooperative modes, additional Levels, and Game Modes sold separately.

name: Shin Megami Tensei II
description:
Following the remake of the first game, Shin Megami Tensei II is a revamped version of the original Super Famicom sequel with improved graphics and gameplay along with a new difficulty mode.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can...

name: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Ratchet & Clank
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Blur 2
description: Blur 2 was a planned sequel to Blur. The game was cancelled due to Bizarre Creations' closure in February 2011. Three prototypes have been dumped, dated August 31, November 9, and November 10, 2010.

name: Resident Evil Revelations 2: Season Pass
description: The Resident Evil Revelations 2 – Season Pass includes four main episodes following the stories of Claire Redfield and Barry Burton, released weekly starting February 24, 2015. It also features two extra episodes and a bonus character, HUNK, for Raid Mode. All content must be downloaded separately...

name: Minecraft: Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack
description: The pack contained characters from Spider-Man

name: Hi-iro no Kakera Aizou-ban: Akane-iro no Tsuioku - Limited Edition
description: The PlayStation 3 version makes use of the graphical system in Hakuoki: Junsouroku. The sprites move when they talk. The new edition also includes new scenarios, chapter summaries, and a couple of girls will come out to explain about the wrong decisions players made when they get a bad end.

name: Minecraft: Moana Character Pack
description: Minecraft: Moana Character Pack is a skin pack for Minecraft featuring characters from Disney's Moana.

name: Sniper Elite 3: Camouflage Weapons Pack
description:
The Camouflage Weapons pack for Sniper Elite 3 gives stealthy gamers access to a combination of camouflaged and silenced weaponry that can be used across all multiplayer, singleplayer and co-operative game modes.

This DLC pack includes:

Semi-Auto HDM handgun (silenced): a silent, semi-automatic...

name: Ratchet: Deadlocked
description: A high-definition remaster version for the PlayStation 3, featuring 1080p upscaling.

name: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack
description: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack is a skin pack for Minecraft which contains 24 Simpsons-themed skins, released on February 27, 2015 and was delisted on May 30, 2017.

name: Minecraft: Doctor Who Skin Pack - Volume I
description: Minecraft: Doctor Who Skin Pack - Volume I is a skin pack for Minecraft that contains 57 Doctor Who-themed skins.

name: Minecraft: Plastic Texture Pack
description: Make your worlds simple, colorful, and vibrant!

name: Dekiru! Game Center
description: Simulation title where players can run their very own game center, with many parodies and homages of popular arcade titles.

name: Mega Man 10: Bass Mode
description: Play the game as Bass. Bass can shoot in 7 directions. Some of his abilities differ from Mega Man's. Not compatible with Rankings or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 1
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 2
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 3
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Endless Attack
description: Test your skills on a stage without end. Try to break the record for getting the farthest. Results will be displayed in the Rankings. Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mickey's Wild Adventure
description: Mickey Mouse gets a chance to go down memory lane and walk through the timeless adventures he has lived. Mickey Mania is a platformer where all the levels are based on Mickey's most famous cartoons. The levels range about 75 years, starting off with "Steamboat Willie" and going all the way to "The...

name: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax: P4A Story
description: P4A Story (Persona 4 Arena Story) is a paid DLC for Persona 4 Arena Ultimax. This DLC enables you to play through the story of the original Persona 4 Arena with updated Persona 4 Arena Ultimax gameplay.

name: NBA 2K7
description: Old gen port of NBA 2K7.

name: Dynasty Warriors Online Z
description:
On July 18, 2013, a massive update was released in the Japanese version of Dynasty Warriors Online, changing the name of 真・三國無双 Online to 真・三國無双 Online Z.

This update adds the new feature of "Weapon Swapping" similar to Dynasty Warriors 7. Characters and soldiers have been remodeled with their...

name: Doom 3
description:
The 2004-era Doom 3 with enhanced graphics, a checkpoint save system, 3D Capability for 3D Televisions and Achievements/Trophies (Xbox 360, Steam, and PS3).

Unlike the original game which featured the Flashlight as a 'weapon' itself, the BFG Edition instead was 'armor-mounted' meaning players can...

name: Resident Evil 0: Complete Costume Pack
description:
This pack contains all the available costumes for Rebecca and Billy:

[Rebecca]: S.T.A.R.S. 1996, S.T.A.R.S. 1997, S.T.A.R.S. Prototype, Sportswear, Cheerleader, Nurse
[Billy]: Wolf Force, Cody (Street Fighter)

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Day Zero Edition
description: This Day Zero Edition features two custom weapons, the AK-12G Assault Rifle and Crossbow-B2. Finally, the Day Zero Edition also includes the Advanced Arsenal Bullet Brass exoskeleton and EM1 Quantum directed energy weapon. Play before the rest of the world with the Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare -...

name: Salamander
description: A version for the PC Engine was released on December 6, 1991. Based on the arcade version of Salamander, changes on this port include starting from a pre-defined checkpoint upon death in 1 Player mode, faster enemy animations, and improved music.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Benedict Arnold
description: Benedict Arnold is a single-player downloadable content addition for Assassin's Creed III. It was originally available exclusively for PlayStation 3 and PC.

name: Gravediggers
description: Tackle a swarm of zombies in a creepy graveyard. Collect the heads of your fallen foes and take tem to a crypt to score points. The first player to score 50 points wins the round.

name: Duke War!!
description: Rally peasants to chop down trees and discover hidden gold. Take the gold to your dower; when the tower is full the greedy king will collect his prize - bestowing you with 100 points.

name: Nostril Shot
description: Face a horde of monsters in a fast and frantic battle. Upgrade your powers by finding different weapons and costumes. The space maiden with the most points at the end of the session wins the round.

name: Clannad
description: A port for Clannad for consoles and portable devices developed by PROTOTYPE, in which the game is presented in 16:9 resolution and contains 5.1 surround sound in some releases.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Thunderbolts Character Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers include 7 new characters from the antihero team The Thunderbolts: Citizen V, Atlas, Mach 5, Songbird, Meteorite, Techno, and Jolt.

name: Chrono Trigger
description:
An enhanced port of Chrono Trigger that adds anime cutscenes and an exclusive Extras Mode. It is also known for having significantly longer load times in comparison to the original SNES version.

Extras Mode is an option in the main menu that let players view cutscenes and artwork, listen to music,...

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Onikakushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Watanagashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Himatsubushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Meakashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the first arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Minagoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the third arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Matsuribayashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the fourth and final arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Saikoroshi-hen
description: A port of the epilogue to the main story of Higurashi originally included in Rei for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Taraimawashi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri, which acts as a bad ending when the player does not make choices that would lead them to Onikakushi, Watanagashi, or Tatarigoroshi for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsukiotoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri that serves as an alternate version of Tatarigoroshi where Keiichi, Shion, and Rena team up to save Satoko from her uncle for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Someutsushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the first in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Alternative Hirukowashi-hen
description: A port of the alternative version of Hirukowashi-hen originally included in Kizuna Volume II, which contains several changes to its original version in Kai, namely the addition and removal of certain characters and the removal of references to plot details not yet revealed, for modern consoles in...

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kageboushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the second in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Yoigoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc included in Kizuna Volume III based on the manga arc of the same name and features several changes, namely the addition of a new character, Miyuki Sorimachi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tokihogushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the third in the Advanced Story saga that centers on Tomoe Minai investigating a murder case with ties to Rena Ryuugu for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kotohogushi-hen
description: An extra arc originally included in Kizuna IV that functions as a prequel to the entire series for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Omote
description: A port of the original alternative ending that is included in Matsuri for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Ura
description: A port of the additional content included in Kizuna Volume 4's Miotsukushi-hen split into its chapter for modern consoles in widescreen,

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Hajisarashi-hen
description: An extra arc about Keiichi and the Club going to have fun at a pool that was initially included in Sui but later brought to Hou.

name: Lego Jurassic World DLC Pack
description: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, John Hammond’s dream has become a reality. Gain access to new vehicles like the Jurassic Response Unit and explore Jurassic World through the unique perspectives of tourists, employees, first responders. Plus, check out a new look for Owen Grady.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Arrow Pack
description: Inspired by the popular TV series, this pack is set after the shipwreck that leaves Oliver trapped on a treacherous island with Slade Wilson. Experience Oliver’s survival training as they work their way through the jungle to a mercenary camp. In addition to Oliver and Slade, play as fan favorite...

name: Lego Star Wars the Force Awakens: Droids character Pack
LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Avengers Adventurer Character Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers includes 3 new characters: Space Captain America, Scuba Captain America, and Hyperion.

name: Helldivers: Defenders Pack
description:
Helldiver Defenders are the unmovable objects of humanity, capable of holding their ground in any situation. They have a bulkier look and a helmet reminiscent of the knights of Old Earth and used to double as riot police before humanity unified properly.

• The Defender Uniform, a cosmetic helmet,...

name: Helldivers: Support Pack
description:
Support Helldivers are much loved by their squad mates and bring both firepower and medical aid to any squad they join. Wearing the classic grey cape with a black cross they project an aura of capable concern for fellow humans.

• The Support Uniform, a cosmetic helmet, armor, and cape.
• LAS-16...

name: Helldivers: Turning Up the Heat
description:
Helldivers: Turning Up The Heat is a free content update for HELLDIVERS accompanied by the release of the Reinforcements 2 DLC.

Free Expansion Features:
Increased rank cap from 25 to 27.
6 new trophies.
New environment: Volcanic planets, full of dangers.
New Bug type: The Bug Impaler
New Cyborg...

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki SC Kai - HD Edition
description: A remaster of the PSP version of the second installment in the series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the previous installment, with enhanced graphics, cross-save with the PSP version and extras like PS3 themes, music, calendars and more. The game follows Estelle sets out to a new...

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai - HD Edition
description: A remaster of the PSP version of the third installment in the series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the previous installment and the ending to the Liberl arc, with enhanced graphics, cross-save with the PSP version and extras like PS3 themes, music, calendars and more. The game...

name: 3D Collection
description:
